name: Daily Duas for kids
description: Daily Dua for Kids is a collection of all the Duas (prayer of supplication) that we do in our day to day life, with Arabic audio, English and French translation and illustrations.  ******* FEATURES ******* - 36 different Duas  - Kid-friendly interface!  - You can read Dua - You can listen Dua - Simple and attractive layout - Charming look to attract the children - Equally useful for every age of people - Very beautiful voice - English and French Translation of Dua  To change the language, click the action bar at the top right.
